artist: Artist: After Giuseppe Marchese; Delineator: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Antonio Marchi
description: vergin seated on steps under canopy holding child with saints Francis, Bernard and John the Baptist at her feet
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [G.da Cotignola dip.   F. Rosaspina dis.  A. Marchi inc./ M. VERGINE COL BAMBINO IN GREMBO E LI SANTI FRANCESCO MERNARDINO E GIO BATTA];
title: M. Vergine Col Bambino in Grembo e li Santi Francesco Bernardino e Gio Batta
